message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $2000000. This is a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $1500000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $1750000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. I'm confident that this deal will be mutually beneficial. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $1600000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects the value of the product while staying within my financial limits.
